channel.title: Change power of bow?
channel.description:
how do i change the power of a dark bow or anybow ive tried putting the bonus up for range atk n defence n stuff but nothing any1 know how to do this?
ok dont comment on my text language u dont understand it dont bother saying u dont im fed up of people saying that tryin to be perfect..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2007, 02:21:43 PM[/size][hr]any1?
